title: DEKA Trading Corp. Recalls Ineligible Ready-To-Eat Pork Rind Products Imported from Guatemala
summary: EDITOR’S NOTE: July 10, 2023 – Details of this recall were updated to include an increase of 22,084 pounds to the current 20,981 pounds for a total of 43,065 pounds of product subject to recall. Consumers are advised to check this recall release often as...
impacted_products: •	5.3 oz. (150g) foil pouch packages containing “TorTrix Con Chicharrón.”
•	2.8 oz. (80g) foil pouch packages containing  “Señorial Tortillitas MIX CON CHICHARRONES.”
